==Extract the Sample Name==
in the current case, the sample name is extracted from the file path.
{{{
String s=$Location$ ;
int i=s.indexOf("Brs");
s=s.substring(i);
i=s.indexOf(".");
s=s.substring(0,i);
return s;
}}}
